overview: David Rose is visibly a mess as Ricky Ridges finds him staring out the window in dreaded anticipation. Luckily, he has an idea to ease his tension. David smiles. Temporary distraction is exactly what he needs, and Rickey's thick dick will do nicely. With all the bros already over, the after-game party is in full swing by the time Trevor Laster arrives.
title: Behind You
